Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder of a red-brown pottery grooved vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self slip and remains of one line of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394259) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394259)
